column1:
Thai doctors diagnosed a Chinese traveller with mild pneumonia on January 8 later confirmed to have been caused by the so-called novel coronavirus - which has already given rise to 41 pneumonia-like cases and one death in China.

https://www.sciencealert.com/first-case-of-that-new-sars-like-virus-was-just-confirmed-outside-china …

In Peru, the #coronavirus  is being monitored closely, according to Health Department Specialists, among them my cousin Lely Solari who's interview you can read here: https://gestion.pe/peru/minsa-anuncia-medidas-de-prevencion-ante-posibles-casos-de-coronavirus-china-nndc-noticia/ …
